main.bio: I am software engineering undergraduate at Informatics Institute of Technologies (IIT) Sri Lanka. I am a hardworking individual targeting to improve the skills and give my fullest effort for the betterment of your company. I am a skilled and experienced in analysis, design, evelopment, testing and implementation of programming languages and web-based applications. I try my best to enhance my knowledge about new and emerging trends in the IT sector.
